section.title: JAXB Objects
section.para: This module generates Java data display objects derived from running the JAXB xjc against the the underlying implementation. This XML Schema Document is then compiled using JAXB schemagen to generate Java files. The .xsd document may be similarly useful for generating JSON for JavaScript developers. Future versions of the project will provide more complete examples using the JAXB generated data display objects to reduce client dependencies on other libraries.
